backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, suppliers, products, categories, carts, orders, Stripe config, and authorization‑protected query/mutation methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the responsibilities of various frontend source files across pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme variables and base styles for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level routing and layout logic handling authentication gates, landing vs authenticated UI, redirects, and global modals.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Unauthenticated‑user screen prompting login via Internet Identity with styled messaging and CTA.
Admin‑only button that seeds demo products by calling addProduct for predefined entries with loading and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: App footer showing attribution, dynamic year, and links for privacy, terms, and contact.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header handling auth state, cart count syncing, and links for users and suppliers.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Landing page footer with navigation links and a dynamic attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingH: Landing page header with logo and a button that scrolls to and focuses the email input section.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, email, and supplier option, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/seller/ProductFo: Dialog for adding or editing products with form fields, image uploads, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerDas: Seller dashboard navigation drawer with links, placeholder actions, and a store preview opener.
Renders onboarding cards for sellers with actions for store setup and adding products using navigation and callbacks.
Provides an overflow dropdown menu with store settings, view store, and logout actions tied to navigation and identity clearing.
Displays the seller dashboard top bar including menu toggle, search box, notifications, overflow menu, and user avatar.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerPro: Shows a product table with editing, deleting, and stock update controls, handling loading, empty state, and mutations.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal prompting initial Stripe configuration with secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDelayedLoadingFall: Provides a delayed fallback flag for loading states, enabling fallback UI only after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for login, identity persistence, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, suppliers, products, checkout, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus utility classes for shadows and landing-page backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using ReactDOM and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements a shopping cart page that loads items from localStorage, allows quantity changes and removal, and displays pricing totals.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Loads cart items, calculates totals, creates a Stripe checkout session, and redirects the user to Stripe or shows errors.
frontend/src/pages/CreateStorePage.tsx: Provides a form for creating or editing a supplier store using query hooks and handles submission with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, email capture for onboarding, Internet Identity login, and marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a cancellation message after a failed payment and links back to cart or retry checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a confirmation screen after successful payment with navigation options back home or to products.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product listing page with search, sorting, supplier/category filters, and add‑to‑cart logic.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Seller dashboard that loads supplier profile and products, handles errors, loading fallback, and product management UI.
frontend/src/pages/StoreViewPage.tsx: Store detail page showing supplier info, product list, and add‑to‑cart functionality with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/SuppliersPage.tsx: Displays all suppliers with product counts and navigation to their products or store pages.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Exports paths to static image assets used across the app.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: SessionStorage helpers for persisting onboarding email and redirect targets.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Utility functions to resolve product and cart item image URLs with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and layout extensions for the frontend. It integrates plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining the platform vision, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for a Shopify-like multi-store system. Used to track versioned requirements and current problems to fix.
